price: Düşünüp ibret alasınız diye her şeyden (erkekli dişili) iki eş yarattık.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
